snippet: The pressure’s on for teams competing in contests sanctioned by the Kansas City Barbeque Society, including the New Jersey State Barbecue Championship in July.
abstract: Competitive barbecue teams will compete in several contests in New Jersey that have been sanctioned by the Kansas City Barbeque Society; venues include the New Jersey State Barbecue Championship in North Wildwood in July (Metropolitan/New Jersey).
lead_paragraph: The pressure’s on for teams competing in contests sanctioned by the Kansas City Barbeque Society, including the New Jersey State Barbecue Championship in July.

headline.seo: Teams Vie to Be Master of the Pit
headline.main: Fire Up the Pit: My Brisket Can Burn Yours
headline.print_headline: Fire Up the Pit: My Brisket Can Burn Yours
